job description:
Description:
Calling all Data Analysts! Calling all Data Analysts!

THE ROLE

The ideal candidate will possess:
  • Candidate must have - Computer competency, Office Suite – Excel, Word, Outlook
The top three must-haves:
  • Advanced Excel skills
  • Analytical skills
  • Detail Oriented
The person who secures this position will:
  • Candidate will mostly be working independently but will interact with fellow team members
  • Occasions may arise to present findings to fellow Lifecycle team members
  • Daily duties will include data mining, reporting, mapping risk to critical business applications along with some repetitive daily/weekly tasks required by management
